title: Dancing on the Ceiling
brief_description: Before Lionel Ritchie’s hit single from his third album became most recognisable for being. staple of 80s club nights, Dancing on the Ceiling swaggered its way to world domination, charting in countries around the world.

constellations_other.name: Defying gravity (phenakistoscope)
constellations_other.description: Walking on the walls and dancing on the ceiling.
